Entries.Olivia: Oh, my! For me? This is truly an exquisite gift. Thank you, dear!/124 125 348 220 221/This is so thoughtful of you, sweetie! Thank you./336 432 276 608 421/Oh? I don't like this.../18 16 20 22 24 408 80 416 414 412 296 398 410 152 396 397 399/This really isn't appropriate. I'll promptly throw this out!/330 284 149 151 459 346 304/This is a thoughtful gift, dear. Thank you./446 402 418/

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Olivia in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Olivia in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Olivia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Olivia... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: My, my! My absolute favorite genre. Thank you for inviting me out, dear.$3
Caroline said this movie was frightening! I'll be prepared for any jump scares.$1

AfterMovie.Text: I had a wonderful time. We should see another movie again sometime, dear.$3

BeforeMovie.Text: Let's head in early to get good seats, @.$0

AfterMovie.Text: The story was remarkable and engaging.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I've heard good reviews about this film.$3

AfterMovie.Text: The film was quite the experience, dear. Thank you for the invite.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I have a feeling this film will be a disappointment...$2

Entries.Olivia: My, my. What a beautiful day for a festival.$0#$e#Are you participating in the egg hunt, @?$3
I just love celebrating the spring, don't you, sweetie?$1#$b#Are you going on the egg hunt? I'll be cheering for you.$3
Gatherings such as this give me a great opportunity to talk to Caroline and Jodi.$3
Lovely of you to make it to the festival, honey. Let's partake in the buffet soon.$3#$e#I get nervous when I dance. You can dance if you want, honey.$6#$e#I'll Chear you on!$1
The governor has honored us with his presence, @!$1#$b#I may try speaking with him after Mayor Lewis has finished his conversation. Perhaps he enjoys vintage wine?$3
The soup smells delicious. I might even have seconds, sweetie. Don't tell anyone.$1#$e#I love you, honey.$4
The sky is clear tonight. A flawless backdrop of moonlight for the jellies, wouldn't you say @?$3
The sea is beautiful at night. I'm so happy we can experience the moonlight jellies together.$3#$e#Maybe we can hold hands?$4
Are you enjoying the fair, sweetie?$3
Are you putting on a Grange Display, sweetie?$0#$b#Best of luck if you do. I know how hard you’ve worked this year.$3
I heard screams coming from the maze. What could possibly be in there!?$2
Pierre's spiced pumpkin cider is astonishing. Here, let me pour you a glass.$3#$e#Happy Spirit's Eve, honey.$4
Brr... I should have worn an extra layer.$2#$e#Are you participating in the fishing competition?$3
It’s quite chilly out here, isn't it, sweetie?$2#$b#When we go home, let's get cozy in some blankets. I'll mull some spiced wine for us.$4
Merry Winter Star, dear!$3#$e#Isn't it wonderful how happy everyone is on a day such as this?$1
This time of year makes me so appreciative of family.$3#$b#I'm glad you came into my life, @.$4

Entries.4000001/f Olivia 500/k 2000003: jaunty/-500 -500/farmer -300 -300 0 Victor 20 38 1 Olivia 22 38 3/pause 400/skippable/viewport 20 37 true/pause 1000/speak Olivia "Honey, I just don't understand why this process is everlasting.$2"/pause 500/speak Victor "I'm trying, Mother. There aren't many jobs this far away from the city.$2"/pause 800/speak Olivia "Do you think you'll move back to Zuzu City?$0"/pause 50/speak Victor "No. I have no intention of moving back there. I want to stay here in Stardew Valley.$7"/speak Olivia "Well, you'd better start applying yourself more to finding a job nearby then, Victor.$5"/pause 250/shake Victor 1000/pause 800/warp farmer 20 42/playSound doorClose/pause 200/move Victor 0 0 2/pause 250/move Olivia 0 0 2/emote farmer 8/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 500/move Victor 0 0 1/pause 350/move Olivia 0 0 3/speak Victor "I'm stepping outside to get some air.$2"/pause 300/move Victor 0 1 2/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 250/move farmer -1 0 1/pause 300/move Victor 0 3 2/pause 150/move farmer 0 0 2/pause 150/warp Victor -500 -500/playSound doorClose/stopMusic/pause 850/emote Olivia 28/pause 300/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 300/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 300/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Olivia "My apologies, @. I lost my composure.$2"/pause 1000/speak Olivia "Victor gets... defensive whenever I bring up his career.$2#$b#He's very bright. Top of his class in school, and he always has his nose buried in some obscure book. I don't know why he hasn't found a job yet.$0"/pause 600/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 700/shake Olivia 800/pause 1250/speak Olivia "I feel as if he may have gotten too comfortable living at home. I worry for his future.$2"/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 650/speak Olivia "I have business I must attend to. You may stay and browse the library if you wish, dear.$2"/pause 300/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Olivia 25/end dialogue Olivia "I hope Victor chooses a path for his future soon... I understand he needs time, but he mustn't wallow.$2#$e#...$2"

Entries.4000002/f Olivia 1000/f Jodi 250/f Carol: springtown/-500 -500/farmer 29 89 0 Olivia 24 72 3 Jodi 22 72 1 Caroline 23 71 2 Penny 7 65 2 Lewis 31 67 1 Pierre 33 67 3 MarlonFay 33 103 2 Wizard 33 105 0 Gus 42 72 2 Abigail 47 88 0 Haley 16 90 3 Emily 14 90 1 Linus 104 104 2 Clint 97 77 0 Victor 40 16 0/pause 400/showFrame Penny 18/skippable/viewport 23 72 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -16 3 true/speak Jodi "That's hilarious, Olivia. I've had similar experiences with Vincent. Moments like this with Victor are a treasure.$1"/speak Caroline "Abigail used to do that too.$0"/speak Olivia "Imagine if you'd known this is what parenthood is like!$1"/emote Jodi 8/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 350/move Caroline 0 0 1/pause 750/emote farmer 32/speak Caroline "Hi, @!$0"/pause 400/speak Jodi "It's nice to see you, @. It's a beautiful day today, isn't it?$0"/speak Olivia "Hello, dear! It's wonderful to see you!$1"/emote farmer 20/textAboveHead Pierre "Ah, yes! That is what I mean, Lewis."/pause 200/move farmer -6 0 0 true/pause 2400/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 300/move Caroline 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Caroline "@, I heard about %farm Farm on the radio a few days ago. You're making so much progress!$0"/speak Jodi "Oh, yes! You are, @. You've helped our little community to grow.$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 300/speak Olivia "Vineyards are quite profitable in this region. I heard rumors about how much Sophia makes each quarter.$3"/speak Caroline "How much is it!?"/speak Jodi "!!!$0"/pause 200/textAboveHead Lewis "I'm happy to hear that, Pierre."/pause 750/speak Olivia "It's over six figures!$1"/emote Jodi 16 true/pause 200/emote Caroline 16 true/pause 100/emote farmer 16 true/pause 750/speak Olivia "@. Have you considered turning %farm Farm into a vineyard, like Blue Moon Vineyard?$1"/pause 200/emote farmer 16/pause 600/question fork0 "(What should I say?)#I'm already making wine.#Wine production isn't the path I want to go down.#I'm not at the level where I can make large amounts of wine yet."/fork 4000002_MakesWine/pause 500/speak Olivia "I understand. Take your time, dear. If you do ever decide to turn your hand to winemaking, let me know. I want to try the first batch!$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/emote Olivia 32/pause 500/speak Caroline "Pierre loves getting shipments of your crops from Mayor Lewis, @!$0#$b#He says they rival the quality of his own produce.$0"/speak Jodi "I wish Susan sold her crops locally. She ships her produce out of the valley.$4#$b#She once let me purchase one of her fresh melons. It was so delicious!$1"/pause 600/textAboveHead Pierre "You're a great friend, Lewis!"/pause 600/speak Olivia "I'm just relieved Pierre never sells Andy's crops in his store. I think they're shipped to low income villages.$6"/pause 200/emote farmer 16 true/pause 300/emote Jodi 16/speak Caroline "It's true, Olivia. My husband and Andy had an argument recently.$2#$b#Pierre would only allow Andy's produce in the store if it was specifically labeled as: 'Grown at Fairhaven Farm'. Andy didn't like that...$2"/pause 400/speak Jodi "...$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 28/pause 700/speak Olivia "Well, this conversation certainly turned sour.$2"/pause 1650/speak Olivia "@, we're going back to chatting about parenthood.$4"/pause 250/speak Caroline "It was nice seeing you, @!$0"/speak Jodi "Bye, @.$0"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 300/move farmer 8 0 1 true/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Olivia 25/end position 35 63

She ships her produce out of the valley.$4#$b#She once let me purchase one of her fresh melons. It was so delicious!$1"/pause 600/speak Olivia "I'm just relieved Pierre never sells Andy's crops in his store. I believe his crops are shipped to low income villages.$6"/pause 200/emote farmer 16 true/pause 300/emote Jodi 16/speak Caroline "It's true, Olivia. My husband and Andy had an argument recently.$2#$b#Pierre would only allow Andy's produce in the store if it was specifically labeled as: 'Grown at Fairhaven Farm'. Andy didn't like that...$2"/pause 400/speak Jodi "...$2"/pause 400/speak Olivia "Well, this conversation certainly turned sour.$2#$b#@, we're going back to chatting about parenthood.$0"/pause 250/speak Caroline "Nice seeing you, @!$0"/speak Jodi "Bye, @.$0"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 300/move farmer 8 0 1 true/pause 900/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/friendship Olivia 25/end position 35 63

You can have his, sweetie.$3"/pause 200/emote farmer 32 true/pause 200/move Emily 0 1 2/pause 300/textAboveHead Emily "Here, Maru!"/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 500/speak Olivia "This wine is from Blue Moon Vineyard! Sophia crafts some of the best wine in the Ferngill Republic, and at such a young age too!$4"/pause 400/textAboveHead Pam "Gus!!!"/shake Pam 750/pause 600/move Gus 0 0 3/emote Gus 8 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 0/speak Olivia "I strongly dislike beer. It tastes like moldy bread.$0#$b#I prefer dry red wine. I have a personal collection filled with vintage bottles in my cellar.$3"/pause 250/textAboveHead MarlonFay "Hmm... I see."/pause 300/move Gus -1 0 3 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Maru "Thank you!"/pause 250/speak Olivia "Sunshine Vineyard at the Fern Island archipelago makes exquisite ring fruit wine.$1#$b#Their bottles are sold for 5,000G each. I've had my hands full tonight. There are so many people!$0"/pause 300/textAboveHead Pierre "Haha!"/shake Pierre 1000/pause 500/speak Emily "What would you like to drink?$1"/move Gus 0 1 2/move Gus -2 0 3 true/speak Emily "$q -1 null#*** ** **STARDROP SALOON COCKTAIL MENU** ** ***#$r -1 0 emily_event1#'SHOOTING COMET' - Ingredients: Whiskey, Lime Juice, Mint Leaves, Sugar#$r -1 0 emily_event2#'LUNAR HORIZON' - Ingredients: Gin, Sugar Syrup, Lime Juice, Sparkling Water#$r -1 0 emily_event3#'ROSETTE NEBULA' - Ingredients: Vodka, Cranberry Juice, Cointreau, Lime Juice#$r -1 0 emily_event4#'THE BIG BANG' - Ingredients: White Rum, Dark Rum, Orange Curacao, Orgeat Syrup, Lemon Juice#$r -1 0 emily_event5#'RED MOON' - Ingredients: Tequila, Orange Juice, Grenadine Syrup"/pause 250/textAboveHead Gus "Here, Pam!"/shake Haley 700/pause 300/speak Emily "I'll be right back with your drink, @!$0"/speed Emily 2/move Emily -4 0 3 true/pause 350/textAboveHead Marnie "Oh, I see!"/pause 500/textAboveHead Pam "Thanks!"/shake Pam 700/pause 350/move Olivia 0 0 2 true/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 0/pause 250/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 300/speak Olivia "Emily is a wonderful waitress. My favorite cocktail is the Red Moon.$1#$b#I'm satisfied with my wine for tonight though.$4"/pause 300/textAboveHead Caroline "Haha!!"/shake Caroline 1000/pause 500/textAboveHead Wizard "It is time then..."/pause 500/shake Emily 500/pause 400/textAboveHead Sebastian "Try harder!"/pause 400/move Emily 0 1 2/move Emily 4 0 1 true/pause 800/move Gus 1 0 2 true/pause 400/move farmer 0 0 3/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Emily "Here you are, @! Enjoy!$1"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 200/move Emily 0 -1 0/move Emily -4 0 0 true/pause 400/move Olivia 0 0 2 true/pause 500/textAboveHead Lewis "Haha!!!"/shake Lewis 800/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 500/speak Olivia "Oh! I've been taking up all your time.$1#$b#You were heading to the arcade room?$0#$b#Victor and the others are there now.$3#$b#I enjoyed our chat, dear. Have a wonderful evening.$4"/pause 300/emote farmer 32 true/pause 250/textAboveHead Pam "Another!"/pause 650/move Gus 0 0 3 true/pause 300/emote Gus 16 true/pause 800/move farmer 8 0 1 true/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 3 true/pause 500/showFrame Olivia 16 true/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Olivia 35/end position 33 18

Entries.4000004/f Olivia 2000/w sunny: none/-500 -500/farmer -300 -300 2 Olivia 10 6 2/animate Olivia false true 150 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 22 21 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 21 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 22 21 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20/pause 100/skippable/playMusic gusviolin/pause 300/viewport 9 8 true/pause 12000/warp farmer 13 5/playSound stairsdown/pause 400/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 750/stopAnimation Olivia/showFrame Olivia 0/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 500/emote Olivia 16/pause 500/move Olivia 1 0 0/pause 400/playSound openBox/stopMusic/shake Olivia 500/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 300/speak Olivia "Hello, sweetie. I was listening to Haruhi Kiyoko. She's a famous Gotoran violinist.$4"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 0/pause 1500/speak Olivia "I... miss listening to her live on the radio. There's a magic to live music that recordings don't capture. Once, I went to see her perform with an orchestra. She was magnificent.$2"/pause 400/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Olivia "When the war started, all radio broadcasts from Gotoro were blocked here. I'm not sure what happened to her. Wherever she is, I hope she's safe.$2"/pause 300/question fork0 "#I'm positive Haruhi will be fine.#I can't in good conscience say she's doing well."/fork 4000004_ListenViolin/pause 750/move Olivia 0 0 3/pause 1000/shake Olivia 750/pause 1250/speak Olivia "A part of me believes that. I... I don't think she's okay. She's hurting. She's lost loved ones, too.$2"/pause 1100/speak Olivia "She'll never be the same after all this.$2"/pause 1000/switchEvent 4000004_Immigrants
Entries.4000004_ListenViolin: pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 1500/speak Olivia "... I'm hopeful she'll be okay.$2"/friendship Olivia 50/pause 1000/switchEvent 4000004_Immigrants
Entries.4000004_Immigrants: pause 200/speak Olivia "My side of the family is from the Gotoro Empire. My mother and father immigrated to the Ferngill Republic.$2"/pause 1100/speak Olivia "I have family and friends there, trapped and unable to leave. I worry for their safety.$2#$b#I don't know if they're okay or not. It's impossible to call or write to any of them.$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 400/move Olivia 0 0 0/pause 600/shake Olivia 1100/pause 300/move farmer -1 0 3 true/pause 1500/speak Olivia "I've heard rumors of what's happening. I don't want to believe any of it.$2"/pause 900/speak Olivia "I need a glass of wine.$2"/pause 600/move Olivia -5 0 0/pause 650/playSound wateringCan/shake Olivia 750/pause 250/move farmer -4 0 3/pause 1400/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 500/speak Olivia "Here's something you've never tasted, @. Ringfruit wine, aged 30 years, from the Fern Islands.$3"/pause 400/emote farmer 20/pause 800/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 600/move farmer 0 0 2/showFrame farmer 90/playSound pickUpItem/pause 1200/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1600/speak Olivia "You may have met Suki, the traveling merchant. She visits the forest on weekends to sell goods from Gotoro.$0"/pause 1000/speak Olivia "It's sad... the only way we can get anything from home is buying smuggled goods.$2"/pause 700/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 23/pause 1250/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1000/speak Olivia "I purchased a rare Gotoran china dish from her a few weeks ago.$0#$b#It's from a particularly ostentatious pattern. I put it on display in the kitchen cabinet upstairs.$3#$b#I wonder... where did that set come from? What family sold it off, piece by piece, so they could afford to eat?$2"/pause 800/showFrame farmer 91/pause 350/showFrame farmer 92/pause 300/showFrame farmer 93/pause 250/playSound gulp/pause 750/showFrame farmer 92/pause 350/showFrame farmer 91/pause 250/showFrame farmer 90/pause 750/question fork1 "#I've met Suki. She sells some rare items.#I'm glad she helps you stay connected with your home."/fork 4000004_Suki/pause 200/switchEvent 4000004_Suki
Entries.4000004_Suki: pause 1000/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 23/pause 550/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1400/speak Olivia "Her daughter just turned six. Suki's shown me pictures, and she's absolutely precious. I hope I can visit next time she's in the valley.$3"/pause 1500/speak Olivia "She occasionally gives me insider information on what's really happening over there across the Gem Sea. It's not always what the news here tells us.$2"/pause 750/showFrame farmer 91/pause 150/showFrame farmer 92/pause 150/showFrame farmer 93/pause 100/playSound gulp/pause 800/showFrame farmer 92/playSound gulp/pause 550/pause 150/showFrame farmer 91/pause 150/showFrame farmer 90/pause 850/move farmer 0 0 0/pause 250/playSound stoneStep/pause 900/move farmer 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Olivia "Did you enjoy the ringfruit wine, @?$3"/pause 400/emote farmer 20/pause 600/showFrame Olivia 8/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 0/pause 400/playSound stoneStep/pause 900/move Olivia 0 0 1/pause 1000/speak Olivia "It's rare and expensive, but having nice things doesn't matter if you can't share them with those you love.$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 2000/shake Olivia 500/pause 1000/emote farmer 8 true/pause 250/move Olivia 0 0 0/pause 750/speak Olivia "I'm sorry, @. I think I need some time to myself. Is that okay?$2"/pause 1250/question fork0 "(I know what to say)#I'll leave, Olivia. Thanks for treating me."/pause 200/fork 4000004_Leave/switchEvent 4000004_Leave
Entries.4000004_Leave: pause 1000/speak Olivia "Come visit me again soon, sweetie.$2"/pause 800/move farmer 5 0 0 true/pause 1000/move Olivia 0 0 1 true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound stairsdown/warp farmer -500 -500/pause 1500/move Olivia 5 0 0/pause 650/shake Olivia 500/playSound openBox/pause 200/playMusic gusviolin/pause 300/move Olivia -5 0 0/pause 500/shake Olivia 400/pause 600/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 1000/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1750/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 23/pause 1700/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 3000/textAboveHead Olivia "Edward... I miss you."/pause 2500/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 23/pause 500/shake Olivia 800/pause 1500/showFrame Olivia 22/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 21/pause 150/showFrame Olivia 20/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/mail OliviaCellar/friendship Olivia 50/end dialogue Olivia "My apologies for ending our conversation in my cellar abruptly as I did. I was reminded of my hu-$2#$e#Never mind. Please excuse me, @.$2#$e#...$2#$e#%Olivia is now ignoring you."

Entries.8982805/n OliviaDatingLetter: playful/-500 -500/farmer 19 26 0 Olivia 15 12 0 Victor 7 27 2/pause 800/animate Victor false true 150 32 33 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34/skippable/viewport 19 22 true/viewport move 0 -1 5000 true/move farmer 0 -8 0/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/pause 200/playSound stoneStep/emote Olivia 16 true/pause 300/playSound stoneStep/pause 500/move Olivia 0 1 1/move Olivia 4 0 2/move Olivia 0 3 2/pause 1200/doAction 19 17/pause 500/stopMusic/speak Olivia "Oh, @! I trust you received my letter in the mail?$0#$b#Please come in.$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 100/playSound doorClose/pause 200/changeLocation SeedShop/pause 100/changeLocation JenkinsHouse/pause 100/warp farmer 20 9/warp Olivia 20 7/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 100/viewport 20 9 true/pause 1500/speak Olivia "Sorry if my letter caused any concern or worry.$2#$b#I needed to speak to you in private.$0"/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 800/speak Olivia "I haven't dated anyone in years. Not since my husband, Edward...$2#$b#He...$2"/pause 500/move Olivia 0 0 0/pause 200/shake Olivia 850/emote Olivia 28/pause 1500/move Olivia 0 0 2/pause 800/speak Olivia "He passed away some time ago...$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 800/speak Olivia "I feel guilty, like I'm betraying him. I don't know if...if I can be with you, @.$2"/pause 500/question fork0 "#You need to follow your heart.#You're right. We should call this off."/pause 500/fork 8982805_Happy/pause 1000/faceDirection Olivia 0/pause 300/emote Olivia 28/pause 200/speak Olivia "...Okay.$2#$b#We... we should stop before getting too invested in this.$2#$b#I knew this wouldn't be a good idea from the start. There's too much... baggage in my life.$2#$b#This... clears up a lot for me.$0#$b#Please shut the door on your way out.$2"/pause 600/move farmer 0 4 2 true/pause 250/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/friendship Olivia -750/end dialogue Olivia "*sigh*... Present me a wilted bouquet from Pierre's store to officially call off our relationship, @.$2#$e#%Olivia is sad."
Entries.8982805_Happy: pause 300/speak Olivia "...$2#$b#...$0#$b#...$3#$b#You're right. I need to follow my heart and trust my feelings. Edward...truthfully, he would want me to be happy.$2#$b#And I'm happy... with you.$3#$b#I know deep down he wouldn't want me to suffer like this.$2#$b#It is time I let myself feel again. I'm glad it's with someone as charming as you, @.$3"/pause 1200/emote Olivia 40/pause 400/move Olivia 0 1 2/pause 450/speak Olivia "Hey, let me show you the art piece I'm working on.$3"/pause 100/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1100/message "Olivia showed me many beautiful paintings and we talked more about what we want to be together. She seems happier than she was before."/pause 1000/friendship Olivia 50/end dialogue Olivia "Thank you for working through that with me, @.$0#$b#I'm looking forward to spending more time together.$3#$e#%Olivia smiles at you."
